title: New: Cloud Castle Lake – A Wolf Howling
body:
Having debuted their intimate yet bold sound on initial offering, Sync, Dublin trio **Cloud Castle Lake** return with _A Wolf Howling_, another slice of over-the-top, Radiohead-esque beauty.

Again mixing post-rock influences with the stunning vocals of Daniel McAuley, dare I say it, even bringing about a Muse comparison in there somewhere, it’s forward thinking and another indication that the three of them could be onto something rather special.
